Title: Provides that local state of emergency orders issued by a chief executive of a county, city, town or village shall not violate section 291 of the executive law providing equality of opportunity of a civil right
Summary: Provides that local state of emergency orders issued by a chief executive of a county, city, town or village shall not violate section 291 of the executive law providing equality of opportunity of a civil right.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the issuance of local state of emergency orders issued by chief executives of a county, city, town or village
